item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>sounds excellent. if you'r reading helen, hope you are having a great time.</p>
item.content:encoded: sounds excellent. if you’r reading helen, hope you are having a great time.

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Thought you might like to hear this snippet of Helen's email - "We are now in Dawson city. It is brilliant, just like a film set. Population of around 1900 people, dirt roads, saloons, lots of country music. We went to a follie show last night and a casino. It was excellent. Went back to campsite at around 1.30am. Had to get a ferry!! It was still light!! Off to Tangle lakes tomorrow - another 400 miles!! Meeting with another trek group and having a salmon bake."</p>
item.content:encoded: Thought you might like to hear this snippet of Helen’s email – “We are now in Dawson city. It is brilliant, just like a film set. Population of around 1900 people, dirt roads, saloons, lots of country music. We went to a follie show last night and a casino. It was excellent. Went back to campsite at around 1.30am. Had to get a ferry!! It was still light!! Off to Tangle lakes tomorrow – another 400 miles!! Meeting with another trek group and having a salmon bake.”
